Become the Leader People Actually Want to Work For

Gain access to Simon's complete collection of advanced leadership frameworks, courses like The Art of Presenting, and quarterly live Q&As.

Learn More

Why We Do What We Do

We imagine a world in which the vast majority of people wake up every single morning inspired, feel safe wherever they are, and end the day fulfilled by the work that they do. We believe the best way to build this world is to commit to building it together.

Find Out More

Inspiration For Your Inbox!

By entering your email, you agree to receive exclusive offers, promotions, and a treasure trove of uplifting content. You also acknowledge that you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. But no pressure—you can unsubscribe anytime!

A Bit Of Optimism

The latest episodes from Simon's weekly podcast about life, leadership, and generally interesting things.

with LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman

What Your Love Life Can Teach You About Work Relationships
